results.title: Just business
results.brief_description:
A drama of revenge and retribution demonstrating high production values to create a corporate world of greed and indifference. Controlled camera work, lighting and slick editing combine with assured direction of the actors to create tension as this disturbing tale reaches its climax.
WARNING: THIS FILM CONTAINS SCENES THAT MAY DISTURB SOME VIEWERS

results.title: Short black
results.brief_description: This tightly scripted work employs Chandleresque dialogue, noirish mise en scene and high key lighting to create a wisecracking, character driven crime story. Inanimate clay figures and controlled comic timing create characters in an absurdist style which draw viewers’ attention to the features of the genre.

results.title: Hunger nation
results.brief_description: This flash animation creates a dismal vision of the future. Effective use of repetition, perspective and scale creates the illusion of depth immersing the audience in an apocalyptic world. A skilfully restrained yet multilayered sound design combines with visual composition revealing confident use of the Flash program.

results.title: Urban scrawl
results.brief_description: This vibrant documentary leads its audience to a more sophisticated understanding of the controversial artistic subculture of street art. Well controlled production values allow the reasoned arguments of those involved to be developed in a manner that is both thought provoking and educative.

results.title: A Fist full of trolleys
results.brief_description: Set in a supermarket car park, this exquisitly framed black and white genre based work references a rich visual culture of photography and cinema. The fierce struggle between man and his environment has been transposed into a stark and familiar urban landscape.
results.description: Set in a supermarket car park, this exquisitly framed black and white genre based work references a rich visual culture of photography and cinema. The fierce struggle between man and his environment has been transposed into a stark and familiar urban landscape.

results.title: Night light
results.brief_description: A video clip made up of a series of photo stills taken of night lights. Images and the resonant, original soundtrack capture the intensity and variety of urban life.

results.title: To and fro
results.brief_description: A beautifully executed Flash animation that depicts the universal and unrelenting search for love. Selective use of detail and highly skilled illustrative qualities employ sophisticated visual storytelling conventions to produce a powerful emotional response within an epic framework.

results.title: Love of static sound
results.brief_description: A range of visual treatments including image within image and beat mixed editing creates a seductive and culturally revealing music video clip. Two characters are depicted using a high impact visual style with an underlying narrative.

results.title: Impossible touch
results.brief_description: Effective use of experimental camerawork and editing adds complexity to a story of the hesitation and intensity of yearning. This work is an evocation of a shared imagining of what might be. An original soundtrack contributes a sense of journey within the relationship.
results.description: Effective use of experimental camerawork and editing adds complexity to a story of the hesitation and intensity of yearning. This work is an evocation of a shared imagining of what might be. An original soundtrack contributes a sense of journey within the relationship.

results.title: Perception
results.brief_description: This artful documentary is an elegant and graceful insight into skating culture. Skilful camerawork combines with rhythmic editing celebrating the thrills and spills of the scene and the camaraderie of its participants.
